about:
I have completed my Bachelors in Technology in Computer Science and Engineering from NIIT University Neemrana.

Passionate about all things security, pen testing, blue teaming. I have experience in WAPT, VAPT, ISO Auditing.

I am an Energetic, Diligent, Curious individual always ready to make the best of the all the opportunities I get in life.

R&D:
Power Aware Routing Algorithm for AD-HOC Networks in Disaster Recovery

The aim of this research was to provide a power aware routing algorithm for mobile ad hoc networks (MANET’s) to be used in the form of smart badges during disaster relief. We proposed a modified AODV protocol.

Project Report
breakingDES:
Breaking DES

We had to devise an algorithm to break DES. It is implemented in the form of a distributed exhaustive key search. Given a plaintext-ciphertext pair, every possible key is tried until decrypting the ciphertext results in the plaintext.

Project Report
networksec:
Employee Website Monitoring using Packet Analysis

This project monitored the websites accessed by different employees based on their IP and MAC addresses on a LAN network by analyzing appropriate packets. Wireshark is combined with port mirroring feature on a switch to achieve the solution.
ShareCart:
Share Cart

ShareCart caters to all the e-rickshaw vendors and their riders. Our aim was to bridge the communication gap between the two and provide efficient and safe travel experience for riders.

An e-rickshaw driver could sign up with the company by becoming an “e-rick collaborator”. He/she was to be provided with a basic smartphone (at cost) with our app installed in it, which would help them with GPS functionality, ride details, etc.

Business Plan
SmartDoorbell:
Smart Doorbell

This web-app acts as a backend doorbell service. Here’s how it’s setup, a webcam is place just above the doorbell, when someone presses it, it clicks a picture of the person and stores it on the Raspberry Pi, then a python script uploads it to a secure image gallery server, and then the user is notified via a web app.

Project Report
help:
• path - display current directory
  • cat FILENAME - display FILENAME in window
  • cd DIRECTORY - move into DIRECTORY or just cd .. to return to root
  • ls - show files in current directory
  • history - see your command history
  • clear - clear current window
